text: The Boys is an American satirical superhero streaming television series. It is created by Eric Kripke for Prime Video. It is based on the comic book of the same name by Garth Ennis and Darick Robertson, which was originally published by DC Comics. It is about vigilantes with superpowers who abuse their abilities. It stars Karl Urban, Jack Quaid, Laz Alonso, Tomer Capon, Karen Fukuhara, Antony Starr, Erin Moriarty, Dominique McElligott, Chace Crawford, Jessie T. Usher and Nathan Mitchell. The series premiered on July 26, 2019. ==References== Category:2010s American television series debuts Category:American satirical television series Category:DC Comics
title: The Boys (TV series)
